title: Tenchi Muyou! in Love 2: Eternal Memory
original_name: 天地無用!in LOVE 2 - Eternal memory
sinopse: A manga was released around the time that TM!IL 2 was released. Called Tenchi Muyo! In Love 2: Eternal Memory, written by Negishi, the story focused on Sasami and implied that Sasami had a larger role in the movie, behind the scenes.
